title: Lawrence University names Samir Datta VP for finance & administration - madison365.com
content: Lawrence University names Samir Datta VP for finance & administration  madison365.com
description:
Samir Datta will join Lawrence University later this spring as the new vice president for finance and administration, the university announced in a press release Monday.

He comes to Lawrence from the State of Wisconsin Investment Board (SWIB), where he has served as director of financial planning
